short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Motivational quote to kick start your day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At times, we all need a little push to get through the day,
and a word of encouragement to keep hustling through the ups and downs of life.

This extension is a small attempt to help us all to get our daily dose of motivation.

When you click on the extension icon, motivational quote of the day will be shown.
This quote stays for the day and changes when the date changes.

Keep striving for a better tomorrow.
